```{r load-objects}
library(magrittr)

source('scripts/utils.R')

load('rData/sheets.RDS')
load('rData/union-df.RData')
load('rData/osa-idr.RData')
```



```{r bedfiles}
write.table(osaGFP.dds %>% dplyr::filter(osa.HCP) %>% .[,c(2,3,4)], 'rOut/osaHCP.bed', col.names = F, row.names = F, quote = F, sep = '\t')
write.table(osaGFP.dds %>% dplyr::filter(closing & osa.HCP) %>% .[,c(2,3,4)], 'rOut/closing-osaHCP.bed', col.names = F, row.names = F, quote = F, sep = '\t')
write.table(osaGFP.dds %>% dplyr::filter(opening & osa.HCP) %>% .[,c(2,3,4)], 'rOut/opening-osaHCP.bed', col.names = F, row.names = F, quote = F, sep = '\t')
```
